header.title: Camera Ready Submission
header.description: Carefully follow these instructions to prepare and submit your final, camera-ready paper in accordance with IEEE formatting and submission requirements. Ensure all revisions, copyright, and compliance checks are completed before the final upload.

list.title: Revise Your Paper
list.description: Revise your paper based on the reviewers' comments. Ensure that the paper follows the IEEE two-column format and does not exceed the page limit.

list.title: PDF eXpress Validation
list.description: Validate your final PDF using IEEE PDF eXpress to ensure compatibility with IEEE Xplore. Use Conference ID: 69723X.

list.title: IEEE Copyright Form
list.description: Complete the IEEE Electronic Copyright Form (eCF). This is usually done through the submission system.

list.title: Final Submission
list.description: Upload the validated PDF and the copyright receipt to the Microsoft CMT portal.

checklist.title: Submission Checklist
items: Paper revised according to reviewer comments.
PDF validated via IEEE PDF eXpress.
At least one author registered for the conference.
